name: Block Fit - Fill Hexa Puzzle
description:
This is a free block puzzle game. The unique hexagon puzzle board is a fun challenge even for the advanced puzzler. The rules are very simple: everything must fit! Drag and drop hexa blocks to fill the given shapes and unlock more levels. There are hundreds of free levels, all categorized according to their size, their complexity and the number of blocks on the board.

How to play:
Move blocks of a given shape into an empty space. Fill the block with no spaces to complete the stage. Use hints when you are in trouble!

Features:
- Addictive gameplay
- Hexagonal puzzles to stimulate your brain
- Quick & easy to learn
- No time pressure
- Hints to help you pass levels
- Nice music and sound effect
- Compatibility with phones and tablets
